column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////At first I didn't know what to order
column2: but I was told that the almond croissant is a must have at this place. I ordered a giant almond croissant and a chai tea latte
column3: and I immediately found a table. There were a lot of people for a Tuesday morning
column4: but it's not hard to find a seat at around 9 am. I started munching on the croissant
column5: and my chai came really soon afterwards.
